name: .OPZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .OPZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an OPZ file with E-Book Systems FlipViewer and Mac FlipViewer. You can also decompress an OPZ file with any Zip-decompression utility, to retrieve the constituent files it contains. (You may first have to change the file's extension to .zip.)

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
